events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the dropdown's open state changes.

events.name: shouldCloseOnInteractOutside
events.description: When user interacts with the argument element outside of the dropdown ref, return `true` if `onClose` should be called.

events.name: onClose
events.description: Handler that is called when the dropdown should close.

children\\*.description: The children to render. Usually a `DropdownTrigger` and `DropdownMenu` elements.

type.description: Type of overlay that is opened by the dropdown trigger.

trigger.description: How the dropdown menu is triggered.

isDisabled.description: Whether the dropdown trigger is disabled.

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the dropdown menu should be closed when an item is selected.

shouldBlockScroll.description: Whether the dropdown menu should block scrolling outside the menu.

PopoverProps.description: Since the dropdown is an extension of the popover, it accepts all the props of the popover component.
